sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { Tab, Nav, Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Conversations from './Conversations'; import Contacts from './Contacts'; const CONVERSATIONS_KEY = "conversations"; const CONTACTS_KEY = "contacts"; export default function Sidebar({ id }) { const [activeKey, setActiveKey] = useState(CONVERSATIONS_KEY) const conversationOpen = activeKey === CONVERSATIONS_KEY return (
Conversations Contacts
Your Id: {id}
{conversationOpen ? : }
); }
